skillTree.name: Barded Warhorse
skillTree.description: A fine steed from the Carroburg Stables.

skillTree.name: Sigmar’s Ward
skillTree.description: The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.

skillTree.name: Carroburg's Pride
skillTree.description: Carroburg is no longer the central and thriving city it once was for the Empire. Drakwald no longer with it's own Elector Count.  But Aldred von Carroburg was brought up with the stories of old. He commands the Carroburg Greatswords as if their heritage still holds that position of importance.

effects.description:
Ability: "Revered Regiment'' for Carroburg Greatswords (Greatswords)
	(Hero's army)

Melee Attack: +10 for Carroburg Greatswords (Greatswords)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Reik's Watch
skillTree.description: From the Wastelands to the River Reik, citizens of the Western-Reik sleep safely due to Aldred von Carroburg's forces marching along the shores and forests.

skillTree.name: Veteran Greatsword
skillTree.description: The Greatsword as a choice of weaponry among Captains and Generals is a rarity. But for Aldred, the Greatsword wields as lightly as the smallest dagger.

effects.description:
Recruit Rank: +2 for Greatswords units
	(Hero's army)

Recruit Rank: +3 for Greatswords units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: School of Oratory
skillTree.description: The School of Oratory stands proudly in the centre of Carroburg, teaching young scribes and poets the ways of story telling. Al though Aldred showed more promise with a blade than pencil, he did briefly attend the school.

skillTree.name: Reiksmarshal's Orders
skillTree.description: ''Go here, says the Reiksmarshal. Go there, says the Reiksmarshal. I'm sick of it! We are a fighting force, not a marching force''.

effects.description:
Campaign movement range: +10% after winning a battle
	(Hero's army)

enabled_if: Leadership is lower than 50% of base

skillTree.name: Regiment of Fame
skillTree.description: Even the Ostland Blackguard can not match the fame and renown accumulated by the Carroburg Greatswords, and Aldred their last commander of true Carroburg heritage instills extra pride in every single soldier.

effects.description: Adds one extra unit of Carroburg Greatswords (Greatswords) to the recruitment pool

skillTree.name: Spiteful Combatant
skillTree.description: Beastmen, Greenskin, rebellious men, undead, Aldred has fought them all without any besting him. He fights with not just determination, but with spite.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

skillTree.name: Thrust of Frustration
skillTree.description: ''I said, no more! I will not be bossed around like some courier, We make a stand here! Men, with me!''.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.name: Stimulate Growth
skillTree.description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Defender of the Western-Reik
backgroundSkills.description: ''Go here, says the Reiksmarshal. Go there, says the Reiksmarshal. I'm sick of it''.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 8% for infantry units
	(Hero's army)
